CustomField.description: Use this field to store the custom object name. Cannot use the standard MDT Name field since you cannot put a double underscore for a "CustomObject__c".
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Use this field to store the custom object name. Cannot use the standard MDT Name field since you cannot put a double underscore for a "CustomObject__c".
Standard Label and Name fields are required by default, but only used for labeling.
CustomField.label: Object API Name
